title: The Last Man
sinopse:
Ai Omori finds a naked and unconscious boy at a sidewalk and decides to bring him to her home. She gives him a name: Makoto. Makoto isn't able to eat or walk, and doesn't speak a language: practically he is like a baby. But he start learning immediately what people do and soon, show ｓ an incredible strength.

He acts instinctively and becomes uncontrollable.
